description:
The notifications that are sent for create and delete do not send the latest updated info at the end of the create/delete calls. 

The volume.create.end will not have the status and launched_at updates when sending the notification. To avoid another db api call to get the volume_ref, we should return the volume_ref from the volume_update db api call, just like the instance_update call.
title: volume_update db api needs to return the volume_ref

The notifications that are sent for create and delete do not send the latest updated info at the end of the create/delete calls.
